title: Andrew Sullivan Talks Trump, Democracy and Digital Detox
description: Before he was a Contributing Editor at New York Magazine, Andrew Sullivan was one of the most prolific and well-known voices among the early bloggers. Andrew talks with Chuck Todd about how he now tries to limit his digital consumption, and why a renewed emphasis on religion might be the solution.
author: nbcnews.podcasts@gmail.com (NBC News)
